scenes.description: Introduction of the birthday merchandise for 2025.
Introduction of the 'Cool as ICE! Jailbird Ice Tray'.
Introduction of the 'Day-Out With Nerissa Acrylic Keychain'.
Overview of the full Birthday Set and Limited Edition bonuses.
Ending of the 3D Birthday Live, thanking the audience and guests.
Final message on screen and credits.

subtitles.original: Next up!
subtitles.english: Next up!

subtitles.original: Let's go ahead and introduce this year's birthday merch!
subtitles.english: Let's go ahead and introduce this year's birthday merch!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Please take a look at the set.
subtitles.english: Please take a look at the set.

subtitles.original: There's also gonna be a limited set that comes with an autographed postcard!
subtitles.english: There's also gonna be a limited set that comes with an autographed postcard!

subtitles.original: Wow!
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original: So let's take a look at all the details.
subtitles.english: So let's take a look at all the details.

subtitles.original: First up,
subtitles.english: First up,

subtitles.original: can you believe it?
subtitles.english: can you believe it?

subtitles.original: I made a Jailbird onesie!
subtitles.english: I made a Jailbird onesie!

subtitles.original: Isn't it so cute?
subtitles.english: Isn't it so cute?

subtitles.original: It looks so fluffy.
subtitles.english: It looks so fluffy.

subtitles.original: It looks so comfy.
subtitles.english: It looks so comfy.

subtitles.original: It's perfect if you want to let out your inner Fat Flock member.
subtitles.english: It's perfect if you want to let out your inner Fat Flock member.

subtitles.original: You can wear it to sleep,
subtitles.english: You can wear it to sleep,

subtitles.original: you can wear it out, you can wear it...
subtitles.english: you can wear it out, you can wear it...

subtitles.original: Who cares? You wear it wherever you want. It's a kigurumi!
subtitles.english: Who cares? You wear it wherever you want. It's a kigurumi!

subtitles.original: So, do consider picking it up, please.
subtitles.english: So, do consider picking it up, please.

subtitles.original: All right!
subtitles.english: All right!

subtitles.original: And then the next item is...
subtitles.english: And then the next item is...

subtitles.original: the Jailbird beanie!
subtitles.english: the Jailbird beanie!

subtitles.original: Do you want to look cool?
subtitles.english: Do you want to look cool?

subtitles.original: Do you want to look nonchalant while also repping the Jailbirds?
subtitles.english: Do you want to look nonchalant while also repping the Jailbirds?

subtitles.original: Repping the Fat Flock?
subtitles.english: Repping the Fat Flock?

subtitles.original: Now you can with this beepin' beanie! It even has a Jailbird embroider on it.
subtitles.english: Now you can with this beepin' beanie! It even has a Jailbird embroider on it.

subtitles.original: Look at the little horns!
subtitles.english: Look at the little horns!

subtitles.original: They're so cute!
subtitles.english: They're so cute!

subtitles.original: It's so cool and cute at the same time.
subtitles.english: It's so cool and cute at the same time.

subtitles.original: And now for the third item.
subtitles.english: And now for the third item.

subtitles.original: Yo, this is so cool!
subtitles.english: Yo, this is so cool!

subtitles.original: Cool as ICE, I might say, the Jailbird ice tray!
subtitles.english: Cool as ICE, I might say, the Jailbird ice tray!

subtitles.original: You can make six different Jailbird ice cubes.
subtitles.english: You can make six different Jailbird ice cubes.

subtitles.original: They're so cute! Look at all those expressions too.
subtitles.english: They're so cute! Look at all those expressions too.

subtitles.original: I can't wait to use this and put this in my matcha lattes.
subtitles.english: I can't wait to use this and put this in my matcha lattes.

subtitles.original: What do you think? What are you going to use it for, Shiori?
subtitles.english: What do you think? What are you going to use it for, Shiori?

subtitles.original: Uh, I don't know. I think I'm going to put it in matcha lattes too.
subtitles.english: Uh, I don't know. I think I'm going to put it in matcha lattes too.

subtitles.original: But I think I could just put it in my water, I could put it in anything.
subtitles.english: But I think I could just put it in my water, I could put it in anything.

subtitles.original: You could just take them, you could chuck 'em too.
subtitles.english: You could just take them, you could chuck 'em too.

subtitles.original: Not at people, but like, at the floor.
subtitles.english: Not at people, but like, at the floor.

subtitles.original: At people would be okay too.
subtitles.english: At people would be okay too.

subtitles.original: No, no, no! Not at people, you meanie!
subtitles.english: No, no, no! Not at people, you meanie!

subtitles.original: Mococo-chan, save us!
subtitles.english: Mococo-chan, save us!

subtitles.original: Next one!
subtitles.english: Next one!

subtitles.original: And with this, the 'Day-Out With Nerissa' acrylic keychain.
subtitles.english: And with this, the 'Day-Out With Nerissa' acrylic keychain.

subtitles.original: You can take it along with you, take Nerissa everywhere you go,
subtitles.english: You can take it along with you, take Nerissa everywhere you go,

subtitles.original: and take cute photos!
subtitles.english: and take cute photos!

subtitles.original: You know, just like you're uploading it to my favorite app,
subtitles.english: You know, just like you're uploading it to my favorite app,

subtitles.original: Nerissa Ravencroft.
subtitles.english: Nerissa Ravencroft.

subtitles.original: That's the best one!
subtitles.english: That's the best one!

subtitles.original: Her favorite app says 'Nerissa Ravencroft'!
subtitles.english: Her favorite app says 'Nerissa Ravencroft'!

subtitles.original: Yes! This illustration is done by my mama as well!
subtitles.english: Yes! This illustration is done by my mama as well!

subtitles.original: So it'd be awesome if you would share photos with this item on SNS
subtitles.english: So it'd be awesome if you would share photos with this item on SNS

subtitles.original: using the hashtag #DateWithNerissa, please.
subtitles.english: using the hashtag #DateWithNerissa, please.

subtitles.original: Did you just...
subtitles.english: Did you just...

subtitles.original: Never mind.
subtitles.english: Never mind.

subtitles.original: And of course,
subtitles.english: And of course,

subtitles.original: there's also a birthday set that includes a postcard and a bonus voice pack,
subtitles.english: there's also a birthday set that includes a postcard and a bonus voice pack,

subtitles.original: along with these four items. Only the limited edition comes with an autographed postcard.
subtitles.english: along with these four items. Only the limited edition comes with an autographed postcard.

subtitles.original: So don't wait, get yours now for your Fat Flock friends.
subtitles.english: So don't wait, get yours now for your Fat Flock friends.

subtitles.original: Yes!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: Now, what's this 'Day-Out With Nerissa' bonus voice pack like, huh? Do you have a preview?
subtitles.english: Now, what's this 'Day-Out With Nerissa' bonus voice pack like, huh? Do you have a preview?

subtitles.original: I guess I could tell you a little bit about it.
subtitles.english: I guess I could tell you a little bit about it.

subtitles.original: Well, it's actually based off of the illustration.
subtitles.english: Well, it's actually based off of the illustration.

subtitles.original: So, uh, it's a day out, similar to the dates that you guys came out with.
subtitles.english: So, uh, it's a day out, similar to the dates that you guys came out with.

subtitles.original: I'm going to be going on a date with the Jailbirds to an amusement park.
subtitles.english: I'm going to be going on a date with the Jailbirds to an amusement park.

subtitles.original: So you can look forward to the shenanigans that ensue.
subtitles.english: So you can look forward to the shenanigans that ensue.

subtitles.original: Shenanigans! Always shenanigans.
subtitles.english: Shenanigans! Always shenanigans.

subtitles.original: Anyways, I worked really hard to come up with all this merch so that everybody could enjoy it.
subtitles.english: Anyways, I worked really hard to come up with all this merch so that everybody could enjoy it.

subtitles.original: So be sure to grab yours as soon as it goes live. The link will be in the description.
subtitles.english: So be sure to grab yours as soon as it goes live. The link will be in the description.

subtitles.original: Well, this turned out to be such a wonderful birthday!
subtitles.english: Well, this turned out to be such a wonderful birthday!

subtitles.original: Yes!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: And Advent, I'm so happy that we could celebrate all together as well, it made it so special for me.
subtitles.english: And Advent, I'm so happy that we could celebrate all together as well, it made it so special for me.

subtitles.original: Yay! Happy birthday, Nerissa!
subtitles.english: Yay! Happy birthday, Nerissa!

subtitles.original: And, we also had Justice as guests too, singing with me.
subtitles.english: And, we also had Justice as guests too, singing with me.

subtitles.original: So thank you Justice for coming and celebrating with me as well.
subtitles.english: So thank you Justice for coming and celebrating with me as well.

subtitles.original: And, most of all, thank you Jailbirds!
subtitles.english: And, most of all, thank you Jailbirds!

subtitles.original: Thank you everyone! Happy birthday!
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone! Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: Bye-bye!
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original:
Jailbirds, thank you for coming to my 3rd BIRTHDAY here in hololive!
You've truly made the last few years of my life so incredibly memorable.
I can't wait to see where this next year of my life with Advent, hololive, and you takes me!
subtitles.english:
Jailbirds, thank you for coming to my 3rd BIRTHDAY here in hololive!
You've truly made the last few years of my life so incredibly memorable.
I can't wait to see where this next year of my life with Advent, hololive, and you takes me!

subtitles.original:
Thanks for always supporting me, and let's keep doing our best!!!
-Nerissa
subtitles.english:
Thanks for always supporting me, and let's keep doing our best!!!
-Nerissa
